title: Question
body:
Hi, few time ago I was in Oceania and I wanted to join a friend but he is in Europe so I change my account. So my account (Mael28) was reset when I come in Europe. The question is, if I comeback in Oceania, my compte will also reset or not ? 

Thanks you for you help and sorry for my inglish, i'm french so xD

Have a nice day bye !

replies.body:
Hey there,

When you transfer to another region there is a very limited amount of info that is carried over, a full list can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ#h2).
